title: Updates icon; sets min SDK level to 7; unrequires touchscreen
message: Updates icon; sets min SDK level to 7; unrequires touchscreen

title: Imported vanilla.nki from upstream
message:
Imported vanilla.nki from upstream

Imported from:
    commit 63ca7f2fb7d421e0a5b7fb53a740a328cc2fb2c2
    Author: Leonard Richardson <leonardr@segfault.org>
    Date:   Wed Dec 19 11:25:57 2012 -0500

title: Updates NKI to Leonard's list as of 2012-11-05
message:
Updates NKI to Leonard's list as of 2012-11-05

This is not yet the final list, but will probably be similar to the
final list.

title: Adds new NKI loader
message:
Adds new NKI loader

This adds support for the new .nki file format.

title: Makes all text monospace to fit theme
message: Makes all text monospace to fit theme

title: Adds about button for Honeycomb+ devices
message: Adds about button for Honeycomb+ devices

title: DEBUG finds kitten for robot
message:
DEBUG finds kitten for robot

The previous debug mode made it hard to actually playtest the game. This
now just highlights kitten.

title: Fixes issue with menu not showing
message: Fixes issue with menu not showing

title: Adds UI instructions tailored to device characteristics
message: Adds UI instructions tailored to device characteristics

title: Fixes issue with new RFKView on 2.x devices
message:
Fixes issue with new RFKView on 2.x devices

This reworks the way the view is drawn. Previously, it didn't follow the
correct pattern. Additionally, this fixes an issue with the monospace
typeface not being used.

title: Moves more values to xml; fixes endgame on tablet
message:
Moves more values to xml; fixes endgame on tablet

In order to accommodate the various screen sizes, the endgame animation
now uses negative margins. Hopefully this doesn't break anywhere.

title: Hides system UI on 3.0+; uses animation listeners
message: Hides system UI on 3.0+; uses animation listeners

title: Reworks RFKView to use views instead of Paint
message:
Reworks RFKView to use views instead of Paint

This allows for theming of the views for sizing/coloring purposes. This
only uses two views which are rendered to the canvas

title: Moves various colors to xml theme
message: Moves various colors to xml theme

title: Updates source for latest SDK version
message: Updates source for latest SDK version

title: Added new icon and artwork; bumped version.
message: Added new icon and artwork; bumped version.

title: Fixed bug with message not displaying.
message: Fixed bug with message not displaying.

title: A few optimizations.
message:
A few optimizations.

Moved from enum to int type.

title: Fixed multi-density scaling; other visual improvements.
message: Fixed multi-density scaling; other visual improvements.

message: Added touchscreen support. Moved toward RFK RFC compliance.
